name: Demon Slayer Fan-Game
description:
This is a Kimetsu no Yaiba (Demon Slayer) fan game that was made in GameMaker Studio 2 for a Game Jam. #DBRGameJam2.

In the game you play as Kamado Tanjiro and you have to defeat the oni to save Nezuko.  

Art by:

prestesdraw.itch.io/

limasy.itch.io/
